name: Don't Touch the Walls (itch) (DOUBLE F)
description:
A game that  is a true test of patience, precision and skill. If you die game will kick you out, and you have to start all over again and again. Let's  find out who can  finish the game fastest. Thats all.

Or is it? Maybe this game is hiding something that only people that like to overthink  simple thinks can find out. The MISTERY of this game goes deep. And the ANSWER even deeper.

Let's see who can solve the MISTERY.

Good luck and, Don't trust the walls.

CONTROLLES 

MOVE/ WASD

MAP/ HOLD SPACE
